column1: #Text=Zuko says : " Uncle , I want the repairs made as quickly as possible .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Do n't mention his name on these docks !
#Text=Once word gets out that he 's alive , every firebender will be out looking for him , and I do n't want anyone getting in the way !
#Text=" Zhao says : " Getting in the way of what , Prince Zuko ?
#Text=" Zhao says : " The Fire Lord 's brother and son are welcome guests anytime .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Our ship is being repaired .
#Text=" Zhao says : " That 's quite a bit of damage .
#Text=You must regale me with all of the thrilling details .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Sorry , but we have to go .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Prince Zuko , show Commander Zhao your respect .
#Text=We would be honored to join you .
